name: Garisangol
description:
Garisangol: Go south from the bridge (장수3교 south) Quickest access is to climb up the valley - and then descend once you've climbed as far as you're prepared to go. There are a few slides within. The most technical section is at the top - where there is a higher risk of falling rocks. Easy canyoning.

The stream passing under this bridge (coming from the north) comes from Oseung Falls - another canyon in the area.

Approach

Descent

Exit
